title: Legislator Hon.Namal Rajapaksa M.P. takes oaths as Attorney at Law
content: Onlanka News – By Dr. Telli C Rajaratnam Legislator Namal Rajapaksa, Member of Parliament took oaths on Thursay December 15 before the Hon.Chief Justice Shirani Bandaranaike and two other Judges of the Supreme Court . His Excellency President Mahinda Rajapaksa and Madam Shiranthi Rajapaksa proud parents of Namal and his brothers Yoshitha, Rohitha and other…
